text: Computational Linguistics is a field of linguistics that deals with making computers understand human language. Some of the biggest sub-fields of computational linguistics are: Speech recognition, which is a computer program that listens to people talk and writes down what they said Speech synthesis, which is a computer program that takes writing and reads it out loud Machine translation, which is a computer program that turns a language into a different one Dialog Systems, which is a computer program that talks with a human to help them do something Category:Computing
title: Computational linguistics
